about_the_game:
Palettopia is the relaxing city-painting game where creativity meets harmony. Discover unique islands, work with their natural landscapes, and paint vibrant districts to bring your dream utopia to life. With infinite islands to explore and endless possibilities to create, your journey to building paradise is as peaceful as it is rewarding.

Meet the needs of the Palettopians by creatively painting and arranging city districts. Each district has specific requirements, and your challenge is to balance these needs while crafting a visually stunning and harmonious island. Complete all 7 district types to unlock joyous celebrations and transform each island into a thriving paradise. Can you create a masterpiece that satisfies both the Palettopians and your own artistic vision?

🎨 Paint Your Paradise: Design your city by painting districts to suit the needs of the Palettopians.
🧩 Dynamic Needs System: Strategically combine districts to meet needs and unlock growth.
🌍 Infinite Islands: Explore procedurally generated maps for endless creativity and discovery.
🔄 Creative Flexibility: Erase and adjust your districts at any time for a stress-free experience.
📸 Photo Mode: Zoom in to capture breathtaking snapshots of your utopia.
⏳ History Timelapse: Relive your progress and watch your creation evolve over time.

Palettopia is lovingly crafted by a small team of friends and family united by a passion for video games, art, and creativity. Together, we aim to share the joy and wonder of building beautiful things with others.
